title: Alton Towers Resorts’ Toni Mountford selected for miaList 2015
text:
Alton Towers Resorts’ Toni Mountford selected for miaList 2015 Alton Towers Resorts’ Toni Mountford selected for miaList 2015 Details Category: Awards   09:30 Alton Towers Resort has announced that Toni Mountford, Corporate Sales & Events Team Leader for the Resort has been selected for the prestigious Meetings Industry Association List in the ‘Excellence in Conference & Events People’ category. The final miaList 2015 was announced at Park Plaza Riverbank on Monday 28th September 
The miaList is a celebration of industry people. Originally created by the mia to mark its 21st anniversary, it is now a landmark annual industry event supported by The Meetings Show UK. Toni, who joined the Alton Towers Resort team in 2007 said, ‘It means a lot to me that my creativity, enthusiasm and passion for Alton Towers Resort shines through. From a business point of view contracting three theme park buyouts in one week was a real highlight, bringing at least 15,000 guests on to the park over one week out of season was a massive achievement for our team’. Ellie Jones, Business Development Manager, Alton Towers Resort who nominated Toni said, ‘The words ‘no’ or ‘unachievable’ are not in Toni’s vocabulary. She’s the first to come up with solutions’.
